_header: Mankind I call which lyeth in frail
Note: Var. burden in London, British Library Royal Appendix 58, f. 8v; cf. 5066.
Subjects: Christ, appeal of, to man; carols, of Christ’s pleading
_description: Christ’s Call to Mankind — seven 4-line stanzas (abcb) and 6-line burden: ‘Com home agayne / Com home agayne / Min owine swet hart com home agayne / Ye are gone astray / Owt of youer way / There[fore] com h[o]me agayne’

BLRoy17Bxliii.First Lines:
Mankend I cale wich lyith in fralefor loue I nad The
                    fre…
BLRoy17Bxliii.Last Lines:
…Bot i am he that shall los thefrom satan the phinnes
                    bonde
